title: How ‘Gut Training’ Has Become Its Own Workout in Pro Cycling’s High Carb Era
content:
If you can't swallow 120g of carb per hour, you're getting dropped. Riders have to train their stomachs in precisely dialed feeding frenzies to keep up.

Read the full article at How ‘Gut Training’ Has Become Its Own Workout in Pro Cycling’s High Carb Era on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
